subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Deaths (Fatalities)
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Wouter Weylandt of Belgium crashed during a descent and died of his injuries during the third stage of a race many consider the most dangerous of cycling’s major tours.
snippet: Wouter Weylandt of Belgium crashed during a descent and died of his injuries during the third stage of a race many consider the most dangerous of cycling’s major tours.
